WRITING.TITLE: Pros and cons of President Aguinaldo?
WRITING.TEXT: Hey guys! I'm helping a "friend" out with her research paper. Her topic is "Worst Philippine President" and she chose Aguinaldo. Unfortunately, she can't find any data on the web to support her choice. Can you history-buffs out there help me out and please cite some pros and cons of Aguinaldo's term?? A thorough explanation of the cond would be very helpful. Thanks /r/PH! :)

Trying to help my crush with her research paper. Her topic is about "Worst Philippine President" and she chose Aguinaldo. She can't find any info on the web to support her topic. Can anyone cite to me a pros and cons of Aguinaldo during his term as President? A thorough explanation of the cons would be really helpful. :)
